description.zh-cn: 蔡正元在脸书爆料国民党主席吴敦义曾拿4000万给韩国瑜，韩国瑜痛斥为假消息，并要求蔡正元道歉。
description.en: Tsai Cheng-yuan claimed on Facebook that KMT Chairman Wu Den-yih had given 40 million TWD to Han Kuo-yu, which Han denounced as false information and demanded an apology from Tsai.

description.zh-cn: 2009年，时任中影董事长的郭台强控告蔡正元背信侵占公款。蔡正元最终获判无罪。
description.en: In 2009, then CMPC Chairman Kuo Tai-chiang sued Tsai Cheng-yuan for breach of trust and embezzlement. Tsai was eventually acquitted.

description.zh-cn: 蔡正元在立法院质询时质疑中研院研究员黄国昌就反媒体垄断议题的公正性，并扬言削减其所属的法律研究所预算。
description.en: During a legislative interpellation, Tsai Cheng-yuan questioned the impartiality of Academia Sinica researcher Huang Kuo-chang on the issue of anti-media monopoly and threatened to cut the budget of his affiliated law institute.

description.zh-cn: 台北地检署就三中案起诉蔡正元等人。2021年10月27日，台北地方法院一审依业务侵占等罪判处蔡正元3年6个月徒刑。
description.en: The Taipei District Prosecutors Office indicted Tsai Cheng-yuan and others in the Three Zhong case. On October 27, 2021, the Taipei District Court sentenced Tsai to 3 years and 6 months in prison for charges including embezzlement in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 澳洲媒体引述匿名来源称，蔡正元与中国商人孙天群联手，威逼利诱王立强，要求他改变说词，声称此前的爆料是受民进党指使。
description.en: Australian media, citing anonymous sources, alleged that Tsai Cheng-yuan collaborated with Chinese businessman Sun Tianqun to coerce and induce Wang Liqiang to change his testimony and claim his previous revelations were directed by the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 被指控与孙天群联手威逼王立强。
description.en: Alleged to have collaborated with Sun Tianqun to pressure Wang Liqiang.
